s = input()

a = s.count('-')
b = s.count('o')

if(b == 0 or a % b == 0):
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")

s = input()
x = s.count('o')
y = s.count('-')
if x == 0 or y == 0:
    print('YES')
else:
    print('YES' if y % x == 0 else 'NO')

s = input()
t = s.count('o')
c = s.count('-')
if (t == 0 or c % t == 0):
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")

from collections import Counter

s = input()

c = Counter(s)

if c['o'] == 0:
    print("YES")
else:
    print("YES" if c['-']%c['o'] == 0 else "NO")

s = input()
c1 = s.count('-')
c2 = s.count('o')
if c2 == 0 or (c2 != 0 and c1 % c2 == 0):
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")

s = input()
p = len([char for char in s if char == 'o'])
l = len([char for char in s if char == '-'])
if p == 0 or l % p == 0:
	print('YES')
else:
	print('NO')

s = input().strip()

pearls = s.count("o")
links = s.count("-")

if not pearls or links % pearls == 0:
    print('YES')
else:
    print('NO')

from collections import Counter
nl = Counter(input())
print('YES' if len(nl) == 1 or nl['-'] % nl['o'] == 0 else 'NO')
